root.title: rothman close joint ventur china
root.body: rothman intern plc rot.l aim set joint ventur jinan cigarett factori shandong china produc high qualiti cigarett export chines newspap sai china daili sai factori produc high qualiti gener brand cigarett us advanc machineri technic assist worth 2.5 mln dlr donat rothman co oper agreement sign 1985 econom daili newspap sai high qualiti gener will help china cigarett enter intern market two paper give detail
